document.full_text: rebels fighting to oust libyan leader muammar gaddafi said on saturday they have reached an agreement with italy to supply them with weapons, but the former colonial power denied the report.
document.title: italy to supply libyan rebels with arms: spokesman
lines_and_colors: rebels fighting to oust libyan leader muammar gaddafi said on saturday they have reached an agreement with italy to supply them with weapons, but the former colonial power denied the report.
